hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select etsource.* from external_trade_source etsource join external_trade_system etsystem on etsource.external_trade_system_oid = etsystem.oid and etsource.external_trade_src_name <> 'NonDefined' order by etsource.external_trade_src_name
select etstate.* from external_trade_state etstate order by etstate.external_trade_state_name
select etstatus.* from external_trade_status etstatus order by etstatus.external_trade_status_name
select distinct em.* from external_mapping em where em.mapping_type = 'K' order by em.external_value1
hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct em from ExternalMapping em where em.mappingType = 'K'
